name: The Visitors (itch) (zhoel13)
description:
The Visitors, developed and published by Keyondre Betaudier '22, Kaifei Lin '21, Amanda Aalto '22, and Bryan Aguilar '22 is an interactive horror fiction about four college students going on a camping trip to an abandoned camp site. Emulating international atmospheric horror games such as DreadOut (Indonesia) and Silent Hill (Japan), this text-based game also emphasizes teamwork to complete the tasks and unveil the mystery.    

This  game is part of the student collaborative game projects for Global Video Games seminar at Hobart and William Smith Colleges in Spring 2021.
